hns_desc:
**RULES:**
Alpha or smaller team = hiders
Beta or larger team = seekers
{icon} 1min for uneven teams (or 45sec on Moray Towers)
{icon} 45sec for even teams (or 30 on MT)
{icon} No subs/specials
{icon} No map (by extension no super jump)
{icon} Hiders win if time is up without all of them having died
{icon} Seekers win if all hiders die
{icon} Hiding time deaths are excluded
{icon} Any seeker that dies may continue
{icon} Any hider that dies is out and may only return as a spectator
